description: A binary m-sequence: expansion of reciprocal of x^3+x^2+1.
references: S. W. Golomb, Shift-Register Sequences, Holden-Day, San Francisco, 1967.
H. D. Lueke, Korrelationssignale, Springer 1992, pp. 43-48.
F. J. MacWilliams and N. J. A. Sloane, The Theory of Error-Correcting Codes, Elsevier/North Holland, 1978, p. 408.
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,0,0,0,0,1).
mathematica: PadLeft[ Mod[ CoefficientList[ Series[1/(1 + x^2 + x^3), {x, 0, 102}], x], 2], 105] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_ *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
